xwikidoc.title: Castle Drolon
xwikidoc.content: Castle Drolon is a fortification located at the crossing of Old Street over the Farth River. It is the holding of Sir Michael Everdawn, a knight in the service of Baron Faran Markelhay of Farlond in fief simple.
